verses.name: Acts 15:24
verses.text: Forasmuch as we have heard, that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words, subverting your souls, saying, Ye must be circumcised, and keep the law: to whom we gave no such commandment:

verses.name: Acts 15:25
verses.text: It seemed good unto us, being assembled with one accord, to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul,

verses.name: Acts 15:26
verses.text: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Acts 15:27
verses.text: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas, who shall also tell you the same things by mouth.
